entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Atikokan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:46 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Atikokan 04:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -16.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -20.2°C
Wind: NNW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the morning then rising. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the morning then rising. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
